otpVerification.subtitle: Please enter the verification code sent to your email.

resetPassword.title: Create new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Your new password must be unique from those previously used.

passwordChanged.title: Password Changed!
passwordChanged.subtitle: Your password has been changed successfully.

welcome.text: Unleash the magic within. Transform your energy, master your strength, and create the best version of yourself.

sex.title: Let's Get to Know You
sex.subtitle: Tell us about yourself to personalize your path to mastery.

age.title: How old are you?
age.subtitle: Your age helps us to provide you with the best experience.

weight.title: What's Your Current Weight?
weight.subtitle: Every journey begins with a solid foundation. Let's record where you stand today.

height.title: What's Your Height?
height.subtitle: Your height helps us tailor your transformation process.

goal.title: What's Your Fitness Goal?
goal.subtitle: Define your goal to help us personalize your journey. Let's make it happen.

ready.title: You're Ready to Begin!
ready.subtitle: Your path as a Vigormancer starts now. Every step, every rep, every moment of effort brings you closer to mastering your strength and unlocking your full potential.
ready.remember: Remember, progress is the real magic. Let's make it happen!

validation.number: Must contain at least one number
validation.lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter

dashboard.title: Hi, {{name}}!
dashboard.subtitle: Every workout, a step toward power.
dashboard.streakMessage_zero: The fire wait for you. Let's go!
dashboard.streakMessage_one: The first step is the hardest. Keep going!

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Feel the energy: progress notifications at your fingertips.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Your journey, your power, your story.

language.title: Select Your Language
language.subtitle: Customize your journey with your preferred language
language.info: Changing the language will restart the app.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.subtitle: Secure your account with a new password.

updateInformations.title: Update Informations
updateInformations.subtitle: Update your profile informations.
updateInformations.emailHelperText: Your email is unique and can't be changed yet.
updateInformations.notChangedMessage: To update your informations, please change at least one field

clerkErrors.form_password_incorrect_message: Try again, or use another method.

workout.title: Workouts
workout.subtitle: Channel your energy, master your form...

emptyState.title: No workouts yet
emptyState.subtitle: Start your journey by adding a new workout.

session.readyMessage: Let's go! Channel your energy and master your form.

exit.title: Are you sure you want to exit?
exit.description: Your progress will not be saved. Are you sure you want to exit this workout?

emptyState.title: No exercises yet
emptyState.subtitle: Add at least one exercise to start your workout.

exerciseCard.removeExerciseDescription: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from your workout?

edit.subtitle: Update the details of this exercise.
edit.restPlaceholder: Enter the rest time between sets
edit.restMinutes_zero: Less than a minute rest between sets

createWorkout.title: Create new workout
createWorkout.subtitle: Define your next challenge and push your limits.
createWorkout.name: Workout Name
createWorkout.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the focus or purpose of this workout
createWorkout.image: Choose an image to represent your workout
createWorkout.createdMessage: {{name}} has been added to your workouts.
createWorkout.error: An error occurred while creating the workout.

deleteWorkout.title: Delete Workout?
deleteWorkout.description: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete workout {{name}}?

addExercise.title: Add Exercise
addExercise.subtitle: Define the next step in your journey.
addExercise.successMessage: {{name}} has been added to your workout.

progression.title: Progression
progression.subtitle: Track your growth and unleash your potential.

edit.title: BMI
edit.info: Body Mass Index (BMI) is a measure of body fat based on height and weight. It helps to identify if you are underweight, normal weight, overweight, or obese.

underweight.title: Attention to Weight
underweight.description: Your BMI indicates that you are below the ideal weight for your height. Consider consulting a nutritionist to evaluate your diet and overall health.

normal.title: Healthy Weight
normal.description: Congratulations! Your BMI is within the ideal range. Keep maintaining healthy habits to ensure balance in your body.

overweight.title: Attention to Weight
overweight.description: Your BMI is slightly above the ideal range. Small changes in your diet and exercise routine can make a big difference.

obesityI.title: Weight Alert
obesityI.description: Your BMI indicates mild obesity. A plan for balanced eating and regular exercise can help you reach a healthier range.

obesityII.title: Health Warning
obesityII.description: Your BMI is in the moderate obesity range. Seeking professional guidance is important to protect your health and well-being.

obesityIII.title: Maximum Alert
obesityIII.description: Your BMI indicates severe obesity, which can increase the risk of health conditions. Seek medical help for a personalized action plan.
